name: LEGO Bionicle - The Game [GBA]
description:
Bionicle: The Game is an action-arcade game developed by small, Argonaut Games, Möbius Entertainment and LEGO Interactive. It came out on 01-09-2003. Electronic Arts published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Bionicle: The Game is available on PC, Game Boy Advance, Xbox and GameCube.
